text: Ralph Vernon Mann (June 16, 1949 â€“ January 2, 2025) was an American sprinter and hurdler. He won a silver medal at the 1972 Summer Olympics. Mann died on January 2, 2025, at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Long Beach, California
title: Ralph Mann
